hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /var/lib/jenkins BACKUP_TIME=$(date) git init git add . git commit -m "backup-$BACKUP_TIME" git branch -M main git remote add origin https://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@github.com/suresh0204/backup_jenkins.git git push -u origin main echo "backup pushed successfully"
